page.title: 18HOME LIFE, SAUNDERSFOOT
page.content: At 10.30am we went swimming.The other classes had play.I didn't speak all the way there on the bus.We all swam as many widths as we could in 15 minutes and then we did some lengths. Back to school then I walked back home for lunch.I had lunch and carried my baritone horn back in the afternoon. I had my lesson and played soft ball and then I went to work doing Maths, English + French.After school I found more presents to open at home,watched Gentle Ben on TV.Then went to get ready to go to Brass Band practace-I realised I'd left my instrument in school so my mother sent me to bed.
